items.sentence: The chance that Tom will be executed is very slim.
The children watched TV as Tom was cooking dinner.
It is said that Friday the 13th is an unlucky day.
You guys don\'t think they\'d beat Tom up, do you?
Young children are incapable of abstract thinking.
Tom couldn\'t sleep because he had a bad headache.
Tom couldn\'t understand what Mary was getting at.
Tom didn\'t like the apartment he used to live in.
Tom didn\'t realize Mary had to help John do that.
Tom didn\'t remember to send Mary a birthday card.
